function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor road infrastructure and bad weather conditions impacting access to hospitals","Impact":"Delayed medical treatment for contagious diseases, increased risk of spread","Mitigation":"Improve road infrastructure, provide alternative modes of transportation, establish telemedicine services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health apps, GPS navigation","People":"Patients, medical staff, community members","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Lack of ambulance services in remote areas","Impact":"Inability to transport contagious patients to hospitals quickly, increased risk of spread","Mitigation":"Establish ambulance services, provide training for local emergency response","Technologies":"Emergency response apps, telemedicine, GPS navigation","People":"Patients, medical staff, community members","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Communal spread of viral attacks leading to emergencies","Impact":"Increased demand for emergency treatment, potential strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Implement public health education, vaccination programs, early detection and telemedicine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health apps, early detection systems","People":"Patients, community members, healthcare providers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"}]}
